name: let pressure_sensor = 0 radio.setGroup(1) basic.forever(function () {     pressure_sensor = pins.analogReadPin(AnalogPin.P0)     if (pressure_sensor > 0) {         radio.sendNumber(1)         for (let index = 0; index < 10; index++) {             music.playMelody("C5 A B G A G E F ", 500)         }     } })
